content: ***find this pattern as a free download from hobbii on september 1 2023*** designed for all seasons and skill levels the serene stripes beanie will soon become your go-to hat pattern worked flat in tunisian crochet this hat helps you learn the basics while creating an irresistible texture and fabric the brim is worked in tunisian reverse stitch which mimics tunisian purl stitch but is infinitely easier to do then relax into striped tunisian simple stitch for the body of the hat finishing with basic decreases for a shaped crown seam your hat and start plotting colors for your next one **yarn used** hobbii happy place dk weight #3 50% wool 50% cotton 273 yards per 100g skein a 19 solid total yardage 100 140 1 1 skein b 19 melange total yardage 50 75 1 1 skein c 01 solid total yardage 50 75 1 1 skein join the happy place vip email list for exclusive details deals and giveaways - link 1 1 https //link brands mvk co/ac5f8e7
